news: [New release v0.84] Integrate Nashorn sandbox for Java 15, fix Mac glitches
[Compatibility with Java 16+] Go to github.com/ron190/jsql-injection for the run command
[Roadmap] WAF fingerprint, Inject user defined query, Inject range of rows
[Since latest release] Replace HttpUrlConnection with jdk11 HttpClient
[Contribute] CI/CD with PHP .NET Python and Node APIs, CTF and vuln application tests, ProGuard shrink
[Ongoing] Add refresh token to Spring, add DNS server for out-of-band injection, remove jCIFS
